 2010-02282010-02-23,  ,  ,  JUS, 
ActJudges Act
SubjectWortzman, Susan (widow) and Wortzman Scurfield, Jack (son) ** Survivors' Annuities **
PrecisGranting of annuities to SUSAN WORTZMAN and JACK WORTZMAN SCURFIELD, survivors of the Hon. John M. Scurfield, a Judge of Her Majesty's Court of Queen's Bench of Manitoba, commencing on November 15, 2009.
AttachmentsAttachment
